markdown.markdown:
::: {#hero-heading} ::: h1 Hey, I'm Hans ::: Thanks for stopping by! I'm a data science major at **Northwestern University**, originally from Mauritius.\ In 2023 I earned a full government scholarship as the top‑ranked STEM student nationally.\ My interests span machine learning, large language models (LLMs), and sports analytics. [Get in touch →](mailto:hanskuthy33@gmail.com) {{< fa feather-pointed >}} ::: ::: grid ::: {#about-me-1 .g-col-6} **From Mauritius to Northwestern, with a mission to make data meaningful.** I love applying ML techniques to real‑world data---especially in sports and social good---and I enjoy working in both R and Python. When not coding, you'll find me exploring new analytics papers or writing blog posts on the latest LLM hacks.
  • First ranked STEM Scholar · State of Mauritius Scholar · 2023
::: ::: {#about-me-2 .g-col-6} At Northwestern I'm deepening my skills in predictive modeling and ethical data storytelling. I'm driven by the belief that data is most powerful when shared transparently and applied responsibly.
  • B.S. in Data Science · Northwestern University · Class of 2028
::: ::: ## ------------------------------------------------------------------------
